name: LUXE OIL (2 fl oz)
description: Not only only does LUXE OIL moisturize and nourish the skin but it also has healing properties and helps clear blemishes as well as scarring from small wounds, cuts, and burns and eczema. Some have reported a reduction of fine lines and wrinkles… just another benefit of LUXE OIL. With continued use you'll see improvements in your skin. How to use: LUXE OIL is a very versatile oil that can be used many ways. One primary use is as an in-shower moisturizer poured into a well lathered towel or body sponge. The amount needed varies since some use body soaps that are harsher than others, and some of us use soaps that are free of sulfates and detergents. You can also use it on damp skin fresh out the shower as you would a regular body oil. Other great uses include; hair oil to seal moisture, cuticle oil, and face moisturizer. Instructions: - In-Shower Moisturizer Add 1-3 pumps (more if you’re using the treatment pump that dispenses less product) into a well-lathered towel or body sponge Wash as usual Rinse Pat dry with dry towel or prance around… allow the oils to absorb - Body Moisturizer Apply all over Prance around… allow the oils to absorb This bottle is shipped with a twist top Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Safflower Oil, Sea-buckthorn Oil, Avocado Oil, Olive Oil, and (optional) Fragrance. Ingredient and Fragrance Dictionary

name: Whipped Shea Butter Blend
description: Whipped Shea Butter Blend is a great moisturizer for people with dry thirsty skin! Shea butter is non-comedogenic making it the better option to use on both face and scalp since it is not likely to block pores with proper usage. Not only only does LUXE OIL moisturize and nourish the skin but it also has healing properties and helps clear blemishes as well as scarring from small wounds, cuts, and burns and eczema. Some have reported a reduction of fine lines and wrinkles… just another benefit of LUXE OIL. With continued use you'll see improvements in your skin. - Body Moisturizer Apply all over Prance around… allow the butter and oil to absorb. Be sure to get problem areas such as elbow, knees, and ankles. - Hair Apply a small amount over damp hair to seal in the moisture Ingredients: Organic Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Safflower Oil, Sea-buckthorn Oil, Avocado Oil, and Olive Oil. All whipped butters are sold by volume not weight* Ingredient and Fragrance Dictionary

name: Cocoa Deluxe Whipped Cocoa Butter (8 oz)
description: "Cocoa Deluxe" Whipped Cocoa Butter is a decadent cocoa butter blend that's sure to bring back nostalgic memories! Whipped to perfection, this butter blend contains pure raw cocoa butter and our signature LUXE OIL oil blend. With a slower absorption time it also makes a great massage cream. Not only only does LUXE OIL moisturize and nourish the skin but it also has healing properties and helps clear blemishes as well as scarring from small wounds, cuts, and burns and eczema. Some have reported a reduction of fine lines and wrinkles… just another benefit of LUXE OIL. With continued use you'll see improvements in your skin. - Body Moisturizer Apply all over Prance around… allow the butter and oil to absorb. Be sure to get problem areas such as elbow, knees, and ankles. - Hair Apply a small amount over damp hair to seal in the moisture Ingredients: Raw Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Safflower Oil, Sea-buckthorn Oil, Avocado Oil, and Olive Oil. Ingredient and Fragrance Dictionary

name: LUXE OIL Gift Certificate
description:
USE THE BUTTON BELOW TO PURCHASE A LUXE OIL GIFT CERTIFICATE. Please be careful not to add it to your cart as it will not create the item desired.

How to redeem your gift certificate: 1. Visit http://luxeoil.addictedtoallthingspretty.com/. Shop and find an item you wish to purchase. 2. Select PayPal as your payment option. Log in to your account. You must have or register for a PayPal account to redeem this gift certificate. (To register, click Sign Up now .) 3. When prompted, enter your gift certificate redemption code and follow the last steps to redeem your gift certificate. Important Terms: Printed Merchant Gift Certificates are transferable if they do not include a recipient email address. For security and verification purposes, you may be required to verify your identity using a credit card. Multiple gift certificates can be redeemed on a single purchase if they are in the same currency. Unused balances may be applied to other purchases. Gift certificates do not expire and do not accrue maintenance fees. Neither the merchant nor PayPal are responsible for lost or stolen gift certificates.
